name: service-test-management
description: ## TMF API Reference: TMF656 - Service Test Management  ### Release : 18.5 - December 2018  Service Test Management API goal is to provide the ability to manage tests of provisioned Services.   ### Resource  - ServiceTest  - ServiceTestSpecification  ### Operations Service Test Management API performs the following operations on the resources : - Retrieve an entity or a collection of entities depending on filter criteria - Partial update of an entity (including updating rules) - Create an entity (including default values and creation rules) - Delete an entity (for administration purposes) - Manage notification of events
